description: This file declares interfaces for warning reporting control within the WPEFramework, including `IWarningEvent`, `IWarningReportingUnit`, and nested `IWarningReportingControl` for managing warning categories and events.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: An interface representing a warning event with methods for serialization, deserialization, and details retrieval.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: An interface managing warning reporting, including reporting events and managing warning categories.

classes.name: IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: A nested interface within `IWarningReportingUnit` for controlling warning category settings and exclusions.

methods.name: Exclusion
methods.description: Method to exclude a specific warning category.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Method to configure warning category settings.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of the warning reporting control object.

methods.name: ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event with a specific identifier.

methods.name: FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieves information about a warning category, including default status, enabled status, exclusions, and configuration.

methods.name: AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a warning reporting control to the category list.

methods.name: RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a warning reporting control from the category list.
